data.title: Wilkinson Barker Knauer Named Band 1 Firm by Chambers and Partners 2024 USA for the 14th Consecutive Year
data.meta_description: WASHINGTON — Wilkinson Barker Knauer LLP (WBK) proudly announces that for the 14th consecutive year, it is ranked a Band 1 firm by Chambers and Partners in its 2024 USA rankings for Telecom, Broadcast & Satellite in Washington, DC. For the individual rankings, WBK had five notable attorneys ranked by Chambers. In Telecom, Broadcast, &... Read more »
data.text:
WASHINGTON — Wilkinson Barker Knauer LLP (WBK) proudly announces that for the 14th consecutive year, it is ranked a Band 1 firm by Chambers and Partners in its 2024 USA rankings for Telecom, Broadcast & Satellite in Washington, DC.

For the individual rankings, WBK had five notable attorneys ranked by Chambers. In Telecom, Broadcast, & Satellite, Bryan Tramont, Adam Krinsky, Jennifer Tatel, and Phil Marchesiello were all recognized. Radhika “Ronnie” Raju was ranked in Intellectual Property: Trademark, Copyright & Trade Secrets.

“Our entire team works hard every day to get our clients the best results across Telecom, Broadcast, & Satellite. Our Band 1 recognition from Chambers for the 14th consecutive year underscores the depth of our practice and dedication of our lawyers in ensuring the highest standards of client-centered service,” said Managing Partner Bryan Tramont. “I am particularly proud to have five of our lawyers ranked this year, including Adam Krinsky, Jennifer Tatel, Phil Marchesiello, and, in the IP category, Ronnie Raju. Their excellence as practitioners and leaders in the Firm and the Bar are foundational to the present and future as a Firm.”

Often referred to as “the gold standard,” Chambers and Partners delivers insight and analysis on the global legal profession that is unrivaled in its reach and depth. With a team of over 200 researchers, clients and firms across many practice areas and geographies have trusted Chambers’ research for nearly 30 years. Law firm departments are ranked on the qualities of their lawyers in addition to the effectiveness and capability of the department as a whole — its strength and depth. Individual lawyers are ranked in their practice area(s) based on their legal knowledge and experience, their ability, their effectiveness, and their client service.
